title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 05, 2022, 04:14:56 PMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 10:01:21 PM by Kryptowerk
content: E N T R Y   C L O S E D !________________________Free Raffle - Monero Special Christmas Edition  There will be three winners!1st prize (last block) 2019 Monero XMR 21.0 x 21.0 cm Kryptowerk postcard - funded with 0.25 XMR by Moonbits -- info: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5140464.02nd price (2nd block) 2018 Monero XMR 21.0 x 21.0 cm Kryptowerk postcard3rd prize (first block) set of two unreleased 2021 Monero XMR Kryptowerk postcardMore info: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5186966.0Terms- Account must have positive trade feedback or must be an established Hero / Legendary account (no negative trading feedback!)- I'll take the right to exclude anyone at my own discretion (will only do so with good reasoning: rude behaviour, obvious spamming etc.)- No multis - are going to be excluded from this and any raffles in the future.- If the prize is lost in transit, there will be no replacement- Shipping will be included worldwide!- Minimum of 7 received merits!- BONUS If you are in any way using your time and energy in a proofable positive way towards Monero (dev, promo, blog, vids, support in this forum or similar) you are free to enter, too.How can I participate?UPDATE! possibly 2x prizes!Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 07, 2022, 01:19:15 PMTo up the stakes (for myself) and for some extra excitement I'll give myself a slot in the raffle. #55If I hit a block, this prize will be doubled. Meaning we re-roll again, but giving out two prizes, rolling two blocks, instead of one.Example: 3rd prize (1st block) was already won by a participant. Now we are rolling for 2nd prize (2nd block). My entry is hit: Now we roll again, but twice, giving out two #2 prizes.Just pick any available number between 00-99! Please post in the following format: "YOUR NUMBER/SPOT - YOUR USERNAME"Once full, I'll pick a Bitcoin block that has not been mined yet. The last numbers of the block hash will determine the winner. Slots:00 - ⛏️jones01 - 🗽Krogoth🗽02 - Suzuki Matt 🥩03 - Coin_trader 🪙📊04 - Yoda🚀 05 - 5tift 🖊06 - Top🎂7️⃣7️⃣7️⃣ 07 - Quaker🐂08 - Saxoshi 🕵09 - ☢ Real-Duke ⚛10 - 11 - M🍺r12 - julerz12📿13 - PawGo 🐾 14 - 15 - bct_ail16 - 17 - 18 - Darker45 🌃19 - zuizui 🧸20 - Steeley🔧🔩21 - Th_BTC🧒22 - 23 - hopenotlate🙏24 - slimzak 👩‍💻25 - Humble BTCBTCBTC26 - mojo 🍀27 - GazetaBitcoin 📰28 - Koal-84 29 - 30 - geophphreigh🌍31 - ❄️Iced🥶32 - Jambo USA33 - Fattcatt 😸😻34 - seek3r 🔜35 - 36 - buckrogers 💵37 - Dernoste38 - 39 - 40 - 41 - rat03gopoh 🐀42 - tweetious 🐦43 - cygan👑44 - examples 👨‍🏫45 - tread93 🐌46 - 47 - wwzsocki 🧦48 - 🌭🥵🐶🌭49 - crwth50 - 51 - sweeteye 🍭👁52 - aoluain 🎨53 - Verndog 🐩54 - PeakDK 🗻55 - 🃏kryptowerk🃏56 - 😤DirtyBirdE🐥57 - bestcoin_59 🥇58 -59 - salad daging 🥗 60 -61 - 62 - Mauser🐁63 -64 - HeRetiK 🤪65 - 💎🏅-ICT66 - Remsjack 🦕67 - dozerz 🚧68 - TheBeardedBaby 🧔👶69 - henkcryptotank 🪖70 - Markzellers  71 - 72 - 🦉🐱73 - 2stout🏔💪74 - willi9974 🇩🇪75 -76 - 🛵⛏️ LLC77  ovcijisir 👹78 -79 - 80 - 81 - CoinageMint 🪙🍬82 - bullrun2020bro 🎯83 - haloxon 🧪84 - ☀️bwoy85 -86 - NeuroticFish 🧠🐠87 - 88 - 📚Buchi-88 🕮 89 -90 - JanEmil 📧91 - Frank 🌄🪙92 - 93 -  Cryptogreatdane 🇩🇰94 - 95 - xSlyy 🧐96 - CoinEraser 🪙🚯97 - doblezero 0️⃣0️⃣98 - bitbollo 🤖99 - andulolika 🦐gl & hf!
